description: This header file declares internal functions for the BREE (BSP Run-time Execution Engine) object, which is part of the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It contains function prototypes related to handling pages, static resources, object management, and interfacing within the BREE module.

methods.name: BreeSpoSetBeepEngineDesc
methods.description: Sets the description for the Beep Engine.

methods.name: BreeSpoGetBeepEngineDesc
methods.description: Retrieves the description for the Beep Engine.

methods.name: BreeSpoCreateBeepEngineDesc
methods.description: Creates a new Beep Engine description.

methods.name: BreeSpoPreparePage
methods.description: Prepares a page given its path and data.

methods.name: BreeSpoExecutePage
methods.description: Executes a prepared page.

methods.name: BreeSpoSetStaticResEngineDesc
methods.description: Sets the description for the static resource engine.

methods.name: BreeSpoGetStaticResEngineDesc
methods.description: Retrieves the description for the static resource engine.

methods.name: BreeSpoCreateStaticResEngineDesc
methods.description: Creates a new static resource engine description.

methods.name: BreeSpoPrepareStaticRes
methods.description: Prepares static resources based on path and data.

methods.name: BreeSpoExecuteStaticRes
methods.description: Executes static resources.

methods.name: BreeSpoQualifyPage
methods.description: Checks if a page qualifies based on path and type.

methods.name: BreeSpoConvertPath
methods.description: Converts a page path to a new form.

methods.name: BreeSpoEngage
methods.description: Engages or initializes the BREE object.

methods.name: BreeSpoCancel
methods.description: Cancels or deactivates the BREE object.

methods.name: BreeSpoSetBeepSerIf
methods.description: Sets the Beep Service Interface.

methods.name: BreeSpoSetBeepCspIf
methods.description: Sets the Beep CSP Interface.

methods.name: BreeSpoConfigResFilter
methods.description: Configures resource filtering mode and supervisor page.

methods.name: BreeSpoRegResFilterDir
methods.description: Registers a directory for resource filtering.

methods.name: BreeSpoRegResFilterDirExemption
methods.description: Registers an exemption directory for resource filtering.

methods.name: BreeSpoRegResFilterFile
methods.description: Registers a file for resource filtering.

methods.name: BreeSpoRegResFilterFileExemption
methods.description: Registers an exemption file for resource filtering.

methods.name: BreeSpoGetFormalPagePath
methods.description: Returns the formalized page path.

methods.name: BreeSpoIsPagePathInFilterList
methods.description: Checks if a page path is in the filter or exemption list.

methods.name: BreeSpoPrepareDFName
methods.description: Prepares the Distinguished Name for a page path.

methods.name: BreeSpoEnforceCache
methods.description: Enforces cache expiration policy.

methods.name: BreeSpoCreateBreeSoaIf
methods.description: Creates a BREE Service Object Access interface.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaGetSlapObject
methods.description: Retrieves a SLAP object by name.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaGetCookedPage
methods.description: Gets a cooked page object by path.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaRetCookedPage
methods.description: Releases or returns a cooked page object.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaGetCookedPageData
methods.description: Retrieves data stream and size from a cooked page.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaInvokeObject
methods.description: Invokes a method on a Beep object via SLAP.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaIsBuiltInObject
methods.description: Checks if an object is a built-in SLAP object.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaWriteAString
methods.description: Writes an ASCII string to the SLAP interface.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaWriteBString
methods.description: Writes a binary string to the SLAP interface.

methods.name: BreeSpoSoaIsInterrupted
methods.description: Checks if the SLAP interface operation was interrupted.
